title: Intro to Machine Learning
description: Learn the fundamentals of machine learning algorithms, data preprocessing, and model evaluation techniques to build intelligent systems.
detailedDescription: This comprehensive introduction to machine learning will take you through the core concepts that power modern AI systems. You'll learn about different types of learning algorithms, how to prepare data for training, and how to evaluate model performance. Perfect for beginners with no prior ML experience.
learningObjectives: Understand the three main types of machine learning
Learn how to prepare and clean datasets
Build your first machine learning model
Evaluate model performance using key metrics

title: Intro to Neural Networks
description: Understand how neural networks make predictions and learn through training to solve complex pattern recognition problems.
detailedDescription: Dive deep into the architecture and training of neural networks. This course covers the mathematical foundations of neural networks, different layer types, and advanced architectures like CNNs and RNNs. You'll build neural networks from scratch and learn optimization techniques.
learningObjectives: Understand neural network architecture and components
Implement different types of neural networks

title: Intro to NLP & LLMs
description: Explore natural language processing and large language models to understand how computers process human language.
detailedDescription: Discover how computers understand and generate human language. This course introduces natural language processing techniques, from basic text preprocessing to advanced transformer architectures. Learn about the technology behind ChatGPT and other large language models.

title: Intro to Computer Vision
description: Discover how computers interpret visual data and perform object detection, segmentation, and image classification tasks.
detailedDescription: Learn how computers see and understand images. This course covers fundamental computer vision techniques including image processing, object detection, and image classification. You'll work with real-world applications and build your own image recognition systems.

title: AI & Technology in Mechatronics
description: Dive into mechatronics systems that combine intelligent algorithms with mechanical and electrical engineering principles.
detailedDescription: Explore the intersection of AI and mechatronics engineering. This course covers intelligent control systems, sensor fusion, and digital twin technology. Learn how AI enables robots and automated systems to adapt and learn from their environment.

title: AI Applications in Python
description: Learning to use beginner-friendly & powerful Python libraries to build intelligent systems that can learn and automate complex tasks.
detailedDescription: Get hands-on experience with the most popular Python libraries for AI development. This practical course focuses on implementation rather than theory, teaching you to use TensorFlow, Keras, scikit-learn, and PyTorch to build real AI applications.
learningObjectives: Learn best practices for AI development
Deploy AI models in real applications
